name: Don Joyce
description: '''Donald S. Joyce''' (February 9, 1944 â€“ July 22, 2015) was an American musician who was a member of the experimental [[music group]] [[Negativland]]. He also hosted a weekly [[radio]] program called ''[[Over the Edge (radio)|Over the Edge]]'' on the [[Berkeley, California]], radio station [[KPFA]], for more than 30 years.
